node.excerpt: Bullshit is everywhere . Politicians and motivational speakers have mastered the art. Ads, marketing and PR are its recognized regiment…

frontmatter.title: I smell bullshit
frontmatter.description: I had never indulged myself to write before. I don't know why I never concerned writing. It may be the feeling that it will be a blend of my biased sentiments and bullshit. Bullshiting is what I fear must, its anything other than straightforward truth. Trust me, bullshit is more dangerous than a lie.
